channel.title: cloudflare on Webserver | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in cloudflare on Webserver | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Logging Cloudflare Country Code in Apache Backend
item.description: ... ... LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\" %{cf-ipcountry}i" cloudflare_custom CustomLog /var/log/httpd/site.example.com-cloudflare_custom.log cloudflare_custom ... ... See details in https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168236-What-does-Cloudflare-IP-Geolocation-do-
